data_processor::DataProcessor.check_emai.name: data_processor::DataProcessor.check_emails
data_processor::DataProcessor.check_emai.content:
def check_emails(self, emails):
    return [validate_email(email) for email in emails]

data_processor::DataProcessor.process_da.name: data_processor::DataProcessor.process_data
data_processor::DataProcessor.process_da.content:
def process_data(self, data):
    return [item.upper() for item in data]

main::main.name: main::main
main::main.content:
def main():
    user = User('John Doe', 'john.doe@example.com')
    print(user)
    processor = DataProcessor()
    data = ['apple', 'banana', 'cherry']
    processed_data = processor.process_data(data)
    check_emails = processor.check_emails(['dias@gmail.com', 'diasgmail.com'])
    user.update_email('invalid_email')
    print(f'Check Email: {check_emails}')
    print(f'Processed Data: {processed_data}')

user::User.__init__.name: user::User.__init__
user::User.__init__.content:
def __init__(self, name, email):
    self.id = uuid.uuid4()
    self.name = name
    self.email = email
